column1: feedback
I really love the new update — the UI is much cleaner and faster.
The app crashes every time I try to upload a file larger than 5 MB.
Customer service was helpful, but billing issue still hasn’t been resolved.
Could you add dark mode? My eyes hurt using the bright theme at night.
I was overcharged this month, please check my account.
The search function returns irrelevant results — needs improvement.
Love the analytics dashboard, helps me track my progress easily.
Notifications are too frequent and spammy — I turned them off.
Please allow exporting data to CSV directly.
Login failed after I changed my password, now I’m locked out.

The UI is sluggish on mobile devices.
I appreciate the fast load times, good job!
The billing page layout is confusing and hard to navigate.
I received wrong invoice email, details are inaccurate.
Charts show zero data even though I have records.

Customer support helped quickly — very satisfied.
There’s a typo in the homepage tagline.

I like the new color scheme — looks modern and clean.
I never received confirmation email after signup.

Subscription renewed without my consent.

Great concept. Would pay more if there was a family plan option.

I enjoy using this app every day, keeps me motivated.

I like that there are regular updates and fixes.
